ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:40:23 [Issue ID 4000-96790] urn:comicvine:4000-96790
ComicInfo.Summary: A titanic tale of foxy boxing in outer space! Yes, FOXY BOXING! On a planet where might makes right, the laws of justice and the rules of combat are one and the same. In order to "win her case," SHE-HULK is going to have to duke it out in the ring. The only problem? She's going up against CHAMPION, the strongest being in the universe! Guest-Starring: Adam Warlock, Gamora, and Pip the Troll.
ComicInfo.Title: Universal Laws, Part 2: Engagement Ring, It's the Lawyer Versus The Warrior
